#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#define max 1000000007
unsigned long long fact(unsigned long long a);
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,i,k;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&k);
        long long deepak=1;
        for(i=n;i>n-k;i--)
            deepak=(deepak*i)%max;
        printf("%lld\n",deepak);
    }
    return 0;
}
